thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 14 of 805
thread.title: Lawrence Barresi

author: Lawrence Barresi
title: Lawrence Barresi
text:
Overall great service, however the $216 Quote: d cost was actually $370. I understand that the refueling fee & CDW were my choice but what are all of the other associated costs. I don't understand RAP, FSO,Concession recoup fee, Tire & battery vehicle licence fee etc. These costs should be explained when making the reservation and disclosed as being included or additional.
ANY extra costs should be CLEARLY disclosed at the rental desk and NOT at the point of pick up. At the point of pick up there is too much happening to ask questions, get answers & make rational decisions!
